result.title: First week: graph problems
result.content:
Here is the first week's problem set. These problems requires you to have good understanding of basic graph algorithms: dfs, bfs, finding connected components with DJS and some graph-theoretic concepts (connected/biconnected components, eulerian paths/cycles, spanning trees) and reasoning.

More problems from other online judges:

  • http://acm.timus.ru/problem.aspx?space=1&num=1441
  • http://acm.timus.ru/problem.aspx?space=1&num=1361
  • http://acm.timus.ru/problem.aspx?space=1&num=1833

Feel free to contact me if you are stuck with any of these problems.
